text:
Happy Wednesday <!everyone>! :wave:

We asked the students to tell us what they thought their strongest skills were:

*The most frequently cited skills:*
> 1) Social Skills :sunglasses:
> 2) Teamwork :couple::two_men_holding_hands::two_women_holding_hands:
> 3) Strong Communication Skills :speech_balloon:

*and the least cited were:*
> - Assertiveness :interrobang:
> - Persuasiveness :kissing_smiling_eyes:
> - Keeping calm under stress :relaxed:

Given that some of these skills are required to be efficient & effective in the workplace, *why not tell your mentees how you use some of them at work?*
It could be a way to help your Mentees *stand out* and prove themselves as *a potential future leader* to employers.
